TEXT.TITLE: MARCUS CORP <MRCS> 3RD QTR FEB FIVE NET
TEXT.BODY:
Shr 14 cts vs 15 cts
    Net 733,000 vs 788,000
    Revs 31.9 mln vs 28.9 mln
    Nine Mths
